title: Study on the Effect and Mechanism of Weichang'an Pill and Its Extract on Slow Transit Constipation.
abstract: Weichang'an pill (WCA) possesses potential advantages in promoting gastrointestinal motility and treating constipation. Ethanol extract (EE) and aqueous extract (AE) of WCA were used to investigate its efficacy in treating slow transit constipation (STC) and the material basis for exerting this effect.
